content.detailedDescription:
Hello,

my name is *(wit's name and other identifying information deleted--sgonzalez/cms). i am also a contactee and devoted skywatcher. since 2005 when i began skywatching regularly, i have been seeing some strange craft here in the skies over northeast ohio. countless hours of skywatching paid off. on may 30, 2007 i managed to catch a triangular shaped unknown craft on film during a night skywatch. the crafts lights are apparently different from known conventional craft. there are no blinking faa lighting on this craft. the craft made no apparent noise. light traffic from the adjacent street next to my home is only heard.

i was shooting with a sony dsr sr40 digital hdd camcorder with the nightvision on, but not the infrared nightvision. this object has 3 white round lights in the form of a small triangle at first in the footage. approx. 35-40 seconds into the footage a smaller light flickered on for a split second in the upper left of the light formation. if one is not closely looking, it will be missed.

the most amazing part is seconds later another white light slowly dims on the craft to show the craft is bigger then first thought. i have never seen a conventional airplane do these acrobatics with light formations, make no sound and have no blinking faa light on it.

**(info moved to "additional information" section--sgonzalez/cms).

a shorter version of this footage was released immediately. i was having pc problems and the whole file would not upload at the time of the sighting. since then, i have fixed the problem and just today successfully uploaded the whole sighting to my shows youtube page: 

***(info moved to "additional information" section--sgonzalez/cms.

 

what was it? i do not know, your guess is as good as mine. i am grateful i documented this sighting and want to encourage others to skywatch as we the people are disclosure.

best regards,

karrie reynolds
content.summary: Triangle ufo, boardman, ohio 2007 video.

content.detailedDescription:
Some friends and i were in their front lawn and i happened to look up and see an object comeing twards us.I wasnt alarmed at first because i thought it might be a plane or jet but as it began to get closer i than realized it was moveing too fast for an aircraft of any i have seen before. i am retired from the military service and this is nothing like i have seen before.As it passed directly overhead there was a pulsating orange glow comming from underneath.If this was a plane,jet or a commet it would of left a trail.This made no sound at all.There were other witnesses to comfirm what i or we saw.
  this object really stunned us because like i said,i can identify many aircraft,this is something new. i am a paranormal investigator/researcher and this was not normal.I had no camera or anything to verfy what we saw but our own testimony.
content.summary: A dull orange and yellow light.

content.detailedDescription: After an eventful day of thunder and lighting here in klamath falls, or it had become very humid so about 1:00am i'd decided to step outside to cool off before i went to bed. our front door faces east i glanced towards the north and noticed a very bright star but lower than any other stars and way brighter. as i observed this weird star i noticed it got brighter and dimmer than i was seeing red with in the flashing lights. i decided to go get my 18 year old daughter to come check it out. she was baffled by it too and noticed that it was moving very fast to the left and right and than up and down but very fast short movements. we decided to get my husband out of bed to witness what we were seeing. when we all came back outside it had moved up and to the right about 3 feet both ways, we could tell by the telephone poll and our neighbors shop but as we stood and watched it just kept moving up and down and back and forth from its main position. my husband and i had witnessed something like this when we lived in wa about 16 years ago but there was 3 of them. he said it looked like what we saw than a ufo. we only watched it for about 15 more minutes and got too tired to observe it any longer. now i wish i would have watched it longer. i didn't take any pics i don't have a good enough camera.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like shape but way lower than any other stars and brighter with flashing white, red, blue lights.

content.detailedDescription: On july 25, 2010 i was sky watching and at approximately 8:00pm a low in the sky, bright looking star moved out of the north towards the west and stop directly over the house. it stayed in that position for almost an hour till it faded away. last night july 26, it was not there. i know that stars for one don't move fast through the sky like a plane and then stop. i also know that if it was a star or planet, it would show up the following night.  when i looked at the "star" through my binoculars it looked white with a blue halo around it. this location was outside of ligonier, pa   i never lost sight of the object, i have neck pain to prove that. it simply faded away before my eyes into the blue sky.
content.summary: Star like, but moving, then stopping for maybe 50 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx year 1985 on hilton head beach, sc., next to the holiday inn. time approx 12:30 to 1:00 am. this not an exact time, or even year. and i am asking my friends that i was on  vacation with and had mentioned this event to if they can remember the year.

myself and a girl both witnessed together a tube-like object. approx. 6 other people were also on the beach at that time that i noticed. i am not sure if they were noticing this event or not at that time. the others were scattered starting about  75 yards and more away from us down the beach.

 by our eye view without optics, the tube like object seemed to be approx 2.5 feet long with a 3 inch diameter with an intersecting inward slanting tube about approx 6 inch long and 3 inch same diameter tube at the rear of the object.

the sky was mostly clear above us, and some cloud cover out over the ocean maybe a mile away. the object seemed to hover in the same locations. over the holiday inn to the left of us facing the ocean.  the object seemed to hover about 3 hundred yards or so over the holiday inn. then after maybe five minutes later it would just appear near the cloud cover over the ocean in front of us. then it would come towards the beach almost over us. it was a very sharp image. the object seemed to every so often appear and reappear at somewhat the same points staying on what seemed the same plane or elevation. there were not any following beams to track this object.

all we both could say to each other is what was that?
content.summary: Orange/red tubular object appearing and reappearing over approx 30 min.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were living on a ranch 70 miles due east of parker,az.
it was late in november, 1981. about a week before thanksgiving. after a long day of work on the ranch we thought we would take a drive to the back
of the ranch. it was dusk and the sun was setting fast. we drove to the top of the levy which surrounded the ranch headquarters to protect it from flash floods. 
    from the top of the levy we had a clear view of the whole valley. the vallet is about 15 miles long and 8 miles wide. there was a small stream which ran at base of the levy along the outside of the compound. as we sat in the truck i looked out the window to the east and saw a light in the distance. at first i assumed it to be a small aircraft. 
    having completed aviation ground school and 20 hrs. of flight training
i was naturally interested in what kind
 of aircraft it was. i pointed out the craft to my friend who did not pay it much attention. that is until i pointed out the erratic movements it seemed to be making.
    we got out of the truck and stood on side facing east. we stood there 
trying to figure out what kind of aircraft it could be. having been to many airshows, flown a couple of small airplanes and a small helicopter,
i kept trying to figure out what kind of craft it could be.
    that is when the craft started doing manuevers that no conventional aircraft i knew of could do. moving staight up 5000 feet. a sudden dead stop and straight back down in the fraction of a second. able to to fly the length of the valley  in less than a second.
    after watching for about 15 minutes i looked to the north end of the valley. there were more of these crafts. it was now dark and within 30
minutes there were so many ships i could not count them. they were small orbs. brightly lit.  incredible manueverability. they appeared to be about two and a half feet in diameter. i believe these crafts to be a multi-functional device used for surveying and exploration mapping.
    after observing for about an hour i pointed ouy to my friend that all of the animals were silent. you could not hear anything. the silence was deadening. no frogs, coyotes, nothing. not normal for a nite in arizona.
    at this time the nite fades out. there are many hours missing from my memory. the next thing i remember is looking to the north end of the valley. i grabbed my friends arm and said look while pointing at a ship. its size would would make a modern aircrat carrier look small. as it passed behind the mountain on the east side of the valley, it was so large only a third of the ship was hidden from view. in comparison to the mountain the craft had to be at least 4000 feet long. it flew south along the east side of the valley until it was in the southeast corner of the valley. it stopped, hovering about 2000 feet off of the ground. at this time, in a matter of a split second all of the small orbs came to a complete halt then in less than the blink of an eye attached themselves to the mother ship. we looked at each other in awe then looked back at the ship. while we watched this large craft shot straight up and out of the atmosphere in a split second. we looked at each other in disbelief. we then went back to the house and sat there in a daze trying to take in what had just happened. would not trade this experience for anything.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Blimp,   Cigar,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Oval,   Other
content.summary: Myself and *(wit's name deleted--cms/sg) observed more ships than i could count. many hrs. missing. smaller ships attached to very large craft at about 5am and left atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription:
This is for the members of mufon everwhere. i want you all to know that the beings and crafts are real.  i have seen them from afar and close up approximatly 5 th 10 feet away. they have allowed me to photograph them, video them and see more of them than i care to.  i wouldn't mind if there had been more witness other than my mother, granddaughter, and wife. i have personally seen these things in downtown kc, and over my house. last week one of these things flew or foated right over my head. i had  been watching the skys that night and saw nothing. convinced that nothing was going to happen this night, i decided to go inside.  just as i reached to open the storm door i turned and looked once more toward the street and gazed up toward the tree in my front yard. at the top of the tree i was shocked to see an object that was tranlucent in color, comming slowly toward me. i at that moment walked away from my door, down my sidewalk and into the driveway, never taking my eyes off this thing. it was approximately 15 to 20 feet in length, had no wings pinkest,red in color. it had a strange glow, almost hypnotic as it came down over the tree in front of me then came lower to the ground approximately 5 to 10 feet above my head. then it stopped. it just paused right above my head for what seem like an eternity which was really only about ten seconds then move in a continual straight line, but before it ascended above my home i shouted out " what are you?' it never responded or reacted and just continued to float over the trees in the back yard and on toward the next block and upward. now i just want them to stop flying over my home without cause. if these creatures are trying to figure a way to communicate with us then i would suggest a better of going about it would be to acknowledge that they are here. state their purpose. and then move on. this is getting tiresome. it is making the few friends that i have think that i need psycological help and perhaps i do, but the facts stil remain the same. i have seen these things all of my life from age 5 until the present. mufon i don't want to tell your people how to do their job, but all they have to do is to look up.  thank god that the creatures don't appear to be violent or hostile. at this point they only seem to be observing. at first these things scared the ("#$%) out of me, but after showing themselves so many times i have become acustomed to them even though each of them i seen is different with exception to the glowing balls which have been different in size, color, luminences, and intensity

what i have realized after submitting several sightings is that i believe that even mufon personell had doubts about the sightings 
 and i don't expect your members to believe me but what i ask is that you keep looking up. they're there! be safe.
content.summary: There have been too many to count.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work in ann arbor mi on pleasant lake road towards
manchester heading west when i noticed something in the sky to the south
west, i pulled my car over to get a better look and it had advanced to my
position very quickly. as it got near i turned off the engine and listened for sound, nothing. it seemed to be no more than 20 feet above the tree 
line, i would guess less though. when it got right over top of me i could 
see it was triangular with a solid light in each corner, one blue, one 
orange and one white. it continued north east and then i lost sight of it.
there were no flashing lights at all just the dull solid lights in each corner. i have seen a lot of unusual things in the sky around manchester
for years but nothing as close to this. i have many other experiences to
relate if interested.
content.summary: Triangular object flew over my car towards the north east.

content.detailedDescription:
*link moved to "additional evidence" section below--sgonzalez/cms.

that link above, is what i posted 10 mins after the event occurred on sept 10th 2001... 

i just hopped into bed... and was about to fall asleep for the night... when i heard a very loud hovering, swoosh sound on my roof.. sounded like some kind of hi-tech aircraft... sacred me.. so i tried to get up.. but i was stuck to my bed with a force field type of energy... froze my eyelids shut.. i couldnt move or speak... i panicked

i felt a telepathic voice say... don't be scared.. i felt it on my forehead.

the sound left.. and i was able to get up...

the next day, the world trade center collapsed... and i thought it was a very odd coincidence.. i don't believe in coincidences tho.
content.summary: Hovering sound over house.

content.detailedDescription:
On january 5, 2006 a friend and i were taking a day-long four-wheel drive trip and stopped to eat a picnic lunch, at an overlook, on the salt river, just below roosevelt dam.  

after eating lunch we walked to a location overlooking the salt river, to look at roosevelt dam and a new bridge, over the salt river canyon. for some reason i looked up in the sky and was amazed to see several white orbs moving in random directions, and at a high rate of speed, in the sky. 

we watched the orbs and then noticed, what can best be described as filaments, also moving in random directions across the sky. the filaments were changing shape as they moved. both the orbs and filaments would appear and disappear.  the filaments were definitely not contrails. they moved rapidly and randomly and changed shapes. they also appeared and disappeared rapidly. as a former commercial pilot with thousands of hours of flight time, i am positive contrails do not look, or act the way the filaments we saw did.

the filaments were very interesting to watch, as they were sometimes stretched out and then would sometimes curve into arcs, like a rainbow, or into other shapes.  as mentioned both the orbs and filaments appeared and then disappeared.  this appearing and disappearing was not because they were moving and went out of sight.  sometimes the filaments and orbs would hover and then, as we watched, they would disappear. 

several other visitors came to the overlook and saw us looking up and asked about what we were looking at. we pointed out the orbs and filaments and they also saw them. we watched this display for about one-half hour, before we had to leave, in order to return to phoenix.  the dirt road from roosevelt dam to u.S. 60, is called the apache trail.  this road is very narrow, with hair pin turns and winds along the salt river.  this is a dangerous road to drive after dark, so we had to leave the overlook, or we wouldn't have made it to u.S. 60 before dark. 

the attached picture was taken by my friend and shows both the orbs and one of the filaments, this was the only good picture that showed both types of ufos in the same frame. the picture is also interesting because an eagle, that was souring in the sky above us, was caught in the frame with the two types of ufos. we sent this picture and others, to dr. paul a. scowen phd, in the physics & astronomy dept., at arizona state university but he said the resolution of the digital photograph wasn���t good enough, to determine what we were seeing.

i also notified the salt river project and bureau of reclamation, both involved in the operation of the roosevelt dam, of the sightings. i also let them know of our filming activity, at the overlook, when we returned with video camaras, at a later date.

i look forward to getting your feedback on this picture. have you seen this type of ufo previously in any reports, or are we seeing something that can be explained? 

i have returned to this overlook on two other occasions and have seen the filaments again but no orbs. on one of these trips, my friend and i took high resolution video cameras with us, in hope of getting footage of the objects we were seeing. the filaments we did see appeared and then disappeared, so quickly, we could not photograph them. also, the number of filaments we saw was greatly reduced from the number we saw the first time we were at the overlook.

i can best describe my feelings during and after the first sighting as being excited at the opportunity to observe this phenomenon.  being able to see the filaments on different occasions also made me realize this was't a one time event.  on the second trip, with my friend, where we took video camaras, we were both disappointed, at not being able to capture the objects on film, with good cameras.  on the trip i made alone, to the overlook and two, or three, of the filaments desended below the canyon rim, i was scared.  i have a masters degree, was in law enforcement and a commercial pilot and i can't explain what i saw.  my undergraduate degree is in biology and i taught biological and physical science and again, nothing in my experience can explain what i've seen at this location.  

on the trip to the overlook, that i took alone, two or three of the filaments descended below the rim of the canyon and were between where i was standing and the canyon wall. from the size of the rocks, i estimated that the filaments were approximately 60 ft. in length. the size of the orbs could not be determined, on our first trip, because we couldn���t tell the distance they were from us.

i believe mufon is serious about ufo investigation and i will be happy to take one, or more, of your staff members to the location of the sightings.  because i have seen the filaments on three different occasions, i think that there is a reasonable expectation that they will appear there again.  

i would suggest going to the site sometime early in january of 2011, in order to best duplicate the date, and weather conditions, when we first saw the orbs & filaments.  i am retired, so i am available at any time you want to go.  another consideration for going in january, is that, at that time there were literally dozens, of both the orbs & filaments, in the sky.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two types of ufos were sighted by a number of people at an overlook near roosevelt dam on the salt river.

content.detailedDescription: First try uploading this photo failed.
content.summary: Disc in phoenix

content.detailedDescription:
i went to pennsylvania for a weekend vacation. when we were driving back, we took the ben franklin bridge back into nj. as we were on it, i noticed off to my right there was a stationary object above the water about a mile from my location. the object was also sort of hazy. as a bridge support went by my vision, the object was gone from the area that i originally viewed it. i then saw it approx. 2 miles to the east a second or two later. it once again was stationary. it was in the same position in the air and strangely did not increase or decrease in size even though my distance from it changed. while moving down the highway, it was obscured by trees for a couple seconds, then it was gone when i was able to see it's location again. i looked all around the area however could not get any other location on it. i remember thinking to tell the other four people in the car with me but for some reason, i didn't tell anyone about it until later that night. the entire event may have lasted about 10 seconds from start to finish. the object could have been easily seen by anyone in the area due to its location was in a wide open area of the sky over the water. this object should have been recorded on the radar of the philadelphia airport. it was well within reach and the area of that airport. judging by my memory of its location, it was probably closer to the walt whitman bridge than the ben franklin bridge. even if i was mistaken on this object and it was a plane, the shape was close to a proper "l" shape and to relocate to its second location, the "plane" would have had to be flying backwards. not possible. this event took place on 04/11/2010 at approx. 3:30 to 4:00 pm est. 

*wit's comment deleted--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: Witnessed boomerang shaped object over water when crossing into nj.

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin and i were waiting out side my mom's house but she was running late. we both witnessed a strange object just floating in the sky.
at first i thought it was a bird just floating and catching a drift of wind because it was windy that day. i pointed it out to my cousin and he said exactly how i was feeling " wierd! ". 
we watched it for a minute while it made weird movements and then flew south faster that any plane or bird for that matter could move.
it reappeared a few minutes later and this time i had my cell phone turned to the photo function and took a few pics. 
it then headed west out of sight leaving both of us feeling really wierd and confused. we were both saying to each other "what the #*@~ was that!"
 in one of the pics there is an airplane and the ufo which helps with the sizing of the object. when viewing this pic the zoom feature must be used. look above the patch of blue sky for the disc shaped object to the right of the airplane. i even inverted colors on the other pic and you can clearly see something was there..And it wasn't a bird or another airplane.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disc in phoenix.

content.detailedDescription: While cleaning up my patio i looked up and saw two very bright star-like objects moving very slowly in a south to north direction. i observed no navigation lights. i ran to my back door and grabbed my binoculars for a closer look. by the time i returned i watched them dim very rapidly so that i could not seem them through my 10x50 binoculars. i watched for a possible re-sighting for about 50 minutes and came in to write this report. the objects were almost vertically overhead and had a luminosity about twice that of venus. they trailed one behind the other. there were no nav lights or jet noise to be heard. i live near an airport so i am familiar with aircraft distinctions. wish there was more to tell but thats it.I was quite calm during the event as i had a feeling this was not ordinary aircraft i am accustomed to seeing in this area.
content.summary: Two objects of short duration.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my back yard with my pups for their last potty break of the night. i was observing the big dipper(which is to the north west of my home.) and other stars when i noticed a orange glow down the road from my home.(directly west) it then started to glow yellow also. it changed colors several times , that is really what got my attention. the orb seemed to move from side to side and up and down but never leaving the confined space between the trees.The light was at approximately 30 degrees and was between large pine trees that grow on either side of the  the road. the pups were anxious to get back inside and i wanted to check the time anyway 10:46. i guess i had been observing the orbe for 3-4 minutes by this time. when i stepped back outside the object was gone. although i did see one moment when a red glow appeaed behind/through the folage of the pine trees. and in the same spot where i had previously seen the orange orb i saw 1-2  tiny white specks of flashing light that only lasted for a brief moment, and were gone.I was dissapointed that the light was gone when i returned. it appeared to be some where in the direction of the old cemetary down the road from my home. there were dogs howling in the distance. they did not seem aggresive or on the hunt like hunting dogs sound . just as if they were warning someone -something not to come into their yard. i could hear the night crickets and other critters. i did not feel alarmed just curious at what i was seeing. it did not appear to bee a helicopter or aircraft. the light was to large and to orange and yellow.
content.summary: Orange?Yellow glowing orbe

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were in the parking lot of the local supermarket (gormans now ridleys)and watched a very large and very bright sphere move across the night sky and at a pretty fast pace for the distance it was at.  the object was extremely bright and moving across the sky from right to left from our position in the parking lot.

1. my wife and i had just finished shopping at the super market.

2. i noticed it due to its very large shape and brightness compared to any anything i have ever scene.  it was also moving at a constant steady but fast pace.

3. by its size and brightness i new it was not an aircraft from either the military or civilian industry.

4.  i would need to stand in the parking lot to be sure but i believe it was moving from south to north.

5. my wife was pretty excited about seeing it. at the time i new it wasnt anything from this world.  but what could i do?  i just stumbled upon this sight so this is about it.

6. the object continued along its course never deviating from its path and flew out of sight.  i would say it maintained a constant altitude.

7.  a few nights later i was in butte, montana and was describing what my wife and i had seen with another field engineer when the same type of object comes out of the south and is traveling at about what looked like the same speed, direction and with the same light intesity as what i had seen a few nights before.  the other engineer who was pretty sceptical at first looked at it and we watched it until it also traveled out of sight.  he looked at me and said " i dont know what that was".
content.summary: Just a very large, very bright sphere crossing the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: Saw an orb on july 21 which i at first mistook for jupiter. was looking at it through my 8" telescope with my wife and daughter.The orb had an arm with lights. while watching "jupiter" i saw it explode with a shower of sparks and smoke. i was shocked to say the least. i then dismissed the event as a satellite,comet or asteroid exploding and that it had a trajectory towards us making it appear as a disc. tonight it happened again.This time my wife saw it in the telescope while i finished hooking it up. she said the orb grew larger and an arm extended from it right before it exploded. she had me look and i again saw the sparks as on the 21st. both sightings were in the western sky about 9:00pm.
content.summary: Second sighting of orange orb that explodes and emits sparks and smoke.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were driving on a road that leads to rt. 11 one of the main roads in our town. i'm a regular sky watcher so i'm always looking up. we drove through a patch of trees and when we emerged i looked up into the sky and saw a bright dot just sitting there, at first i thought it was a star..But it was way to early for stars to be seen ( it was around 5:45 pm) this all happened very fast but after further inspection i noticed that the spherical object was reflecting the sunlight so i assumed it was metallic. it was very obvious to me that this was neither a plane nor a helicopter, just a metallic sphere sitting about 500-1000 ft up in the air.  as me and my friend were driving and looking at the object it started to fade. we drove through another patch of trees and when we emerged it was gone. i have no doubt that this was an object that cannot be explained. if it was a plane i would of seen it when i emerged from the trees. there was no trail following the object. i parked my car about 2 minutes after seeing the sphere and scanned the skies for it again. but i didnt see anything, no planes, no nothing.
content.summary: Metallic sphere hovering then dissapearing.

content.detailedDescription:
Essentially static and distant (5 miles altitude, estimate) - basically a blue light or reflective material. came in and out of presence, as if rotating, and only one aspect of the object was illuminated (or reflecting evening sun). 

my first thought was metalic weather balloon, but do they use them anymore? moreover, object was static, did not move, for at least 15 minutes. viewed with binoculars but only appeared like a larger version of the light/reflection i was seeing and revealed no further detail/objectivity. 

no great or overwhelming sense of having seen a ufo, but just weird enough to be "interesting". by itself, i would disregard this "sighting", unless you receive other information, reports, etc... 

thanks, k
content.summary: Blue light (in daylight) like blue star (off/on).

content.detailedDescription: Saw an object in sky as i was floating on my back in pool. thought it was a bird at first but it was moving too quickly and there did not seem to be any wing movement. noticed it disappeared into rain clouds and then reappeared seconds later. then two more objects appeared. thought maybe planes but one object completed a full cirlce in a very short radius. judging by height and speed and path of travel this was niether bird nor plane. watched objects move quickly and smoothly through sky in and out of clouds for about five minutes. not thinking to get a camera.....Duh. then objects disappeared above clouds not to return. you tell me.
content.summary: Looked like birds at first.

content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pitchblack triangle , no lights except for when moving at fast speeds, then produces orange light at what i believe is the rear.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on the balcony enjoying the evening with my boyfriend, it was a cloudy night - when we looked up and saw 3 illuminated, nickle-sized spheres in the sky. they were moving across the sky in a triangular formation and then suddenly split into individual orbs and just as quickly come back and rejoin almost merging into a single form --all in a matter of seconds!! this went on back & forth, back & forth for at least 15 minutes. 

they were lit up as though they were being projected onto the base of one gigantic cloud that dominated the sky, to the point were my boyfriend joked that there was a probably a ship in that cloud. i really wanted to think that this was maybe a light projection coming from a machine but i could not identify a link/anchor leading to a location on the ground. also, their behavior changed suddenly; they were first sweeping across sky within an area of 200ft but they suddenly covered more territory and it looked as , though they were getting closer to right above our heads when we got spooked they almost instantly raced across the sky out of view!!!!!


i did not have a good feeling about this at all and had witnessed the exact same thing happen in the sky last year at a previous location!!
content.summary: 3 rapidly moving spheres in the sky in boston.

content.detailedDescription: It was friday night and as a family we decided to go outside and look at the stars in the sky. it was a very clear night and we where able to see almost every star that night. as long as i can remember, i had always been able to spot certain stars that move rapidly. you have to stare at it to distinguish if it is a stable star or if it moves. reason for that is because they camouflage along with the rest of the stars in size and color. so that night we where all looking up at the sky and took out our telescope. to my surprise i seen a star move that was very close to one of the shinier stars in the sky. it started moving upwards from my direction as if it were riding along earths outer layer. it was getting smaller and smaller in size as it moved farther away from our point of view. after 8 to 10 minutes i turned around to start looking towards another direction and i spotted another one along with my younger son next to me. at that point the rest of the family had gone inside. i really don't know what these objects are, since i mentioned before i have seen these numerous of times on a clear sky. at first when i was 16 or so, i immediately assumed that they were ufo's and thought it was pretty amazing that i had such a discovery. over the years i have come to think that perhaps they may be new satellites that the government has launched. sometimes i also like to assume that they are special jets that fly and practice at night time. altough a thought comes to me about how quickly these star look-alike objects fly so quickly and sometimes in a count of 4, from different directions. at one time i seen one come from north, and after 10 min another from east, south, and west. it seems strange but never thought of reporting anything as people might debunk me into "it's nothing". one strange thing i seen on friday the 25th of july 2010, is that when it started heading out of my view it somehow got brighter as if it shined a light and then went back to it's normal light activity. what could this be? all i see is star looking figures that move rapidly on a clear sky. i would like to know if anyone has also reported this so they can give me a piece of mind. i will have a camera next and hope it can catch the distance in the camera of the star like object.
content.summary: Stars moving at a rapid speed from different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
First of all i  will appologise for my english!
is not my native language,....:)

the events i am about to tell took place in belgium!
in the nord east of flanders ,next to the seaside (about 28-30 km)

i am a fervent follower of the ufo events and incidents related to ufo,
all over in the world!!!
thanks to youtube and the net,and sometimes via publications,news flash,
or magazines!!!
i am also an sci-fi fan,(movies or novels)

therefore, i always use to look up in the sky ,late in the night,
more specifically since i had another experience some years ago,
(but,... had no video or photo equipment to record the event),...

i am a "bad sleeper",...
sometimes i fall in sleep late around 03:00 or 04:00 am in the morning!!!

late in the evening, just before midnight, had to go to bathroom!!!

ive'd took a look from my bathroom window as i use to do it, almost... everyday and if i have a chance of having a clear sky!

besides airplanes ,or helicopters, with the well known flickering lights,
or sometimes up, up, in the sky at the star levels an ocasional satelliet (or what i supposed to be),there where nothing to be seen!

but,not on this night of 23 july 2010 on 23:52,night with a perfect clear sky, temperature between 18-20���celsius,and with a full moon!!!
(paradoxal on the same date when the ufo congres was held in usa),...:
)
what i saw made my body shaking and my hands trembling (of emotions and anxiety)
in the far horizon ,above the roof of the animal shop,just behind
my backyard (around 20 m) i saw a glowing red-yellow light
(with big diameter ,definately not man made),
rising just above the roof line!

then  second light,and  third one,followed!!!

ive'd continued to look ,amazed,at the event, when a forth, and then a fifth,light(with the same diameter and intensity),start to lift up,
next to the other three,and forming a sort of trapezoidal formation!

at that moment ive'd run down the stairs (my bathroom is at the first floor +/- 5m from the ground floor)to get my handycam,
hoping i will still get some unique,one in a lifetime ufo footage!!!

getting my cam from the living room, ive'd run back like crazy on the stairs to the bathroom,to try to film the event!
ive'd open the windows, large, and then start my cam and i begun to film!

my hands and breath they where both trembling and shaking of emotions, and stress!!!

unfortunatelly,the ufo formation who was still there start to descend,
below the roof line ,blocking my view and the possibility to film further!!
luckily , i have my daughter sleeping room, at the second floor, where 
i have also an open rooftop, installed!!!

i open the window large and from there i start to film further the ufo's!!!
they where still there, only at a smaller distance from the ground, but still high in the sky, ... 300-400 m?!!!
anyway they where still in that 5 trapezoidal formation, !!!

i tried as much as i could to take a decent footage ,trying not to shake,
(too much),and zooming, slowly,....

the recordings where made with a sony crx-hd6 hd handycam, with night vision,and 20x digital zoom!
even so, i could not obtain the quality i was hoping for,...


the lights,the colours, the size and clarity of the real ufo's where much better in real life(this after i replay the recording)
still the recodings they have a good quality, keeping in mind that the originals where made in hd 1440���1080 quality!!!

after another 3-5 minutes the ufo's starts to dissapear,one by one,some becoming invisibles, some descending near a forest on that area!!!
i stopped recording, but i never left the place,
(hoping that i will get maybe another chance of filming another ufo event)!!!

how many times in a lifetime ,we have a chance to get to see 
(or better),to record such an unique event?!!!

what i will tell you surpassed my wildest dreams,..:)

the event that i was hoping to be a witness ,had happened again,..... !!!
after around ,another 1 1/2 hour (01:35am) in the morning,they have apeared,...

again,!!!! again,... 5 ufo's ,in the same position,same place ,
same high,rising above the thin horizon line,one by one,starting to change positions,and moving around (but in a close group),sometimes in a shape of  trapeze,sometimes triangle, sometimes just moving around,....

they stayed in the sky, for another 2-3 minutes, 
then they aligned them self, in a line (diagonal against the horizon),...
and they start to move slowly from right to left (my field of view),
further and further away, until they totally disappeared!!!
some of the recorded footage, was also taken in infrared vision
(or so called night-vision), .....

to prove authenticity, of the recorded footage!!!

the details seen in the footage, are a rooftop ,from the shop in my backyard, with some flags, on the right side, far in the back a thin forest line ,and on the right side a  street light pal ,and far away on the right side a windmill use for producing electricity with warning red lights for airplanes!!!

i also included a short footage with an airplane just passing by, for the nonbelievers, so they can made a comparison , with the real ufo's filmed above!!!(they way the lights, shapes and size apear in the sky!!!
all the recordings are conversions from hd cam recordings in mp4 format,
with unedited audio,for authenticity!!!
best to be seen with divx player !!!

if "mufon" is interested in the real footage, i can provide,
the real hd recordings,(the one from this july, 
and another one rom last year in dec).....
recordings watermarked with the time and date when where taken!!!
(just crediet my recordings,on my name)

and now,about the other event surprised on video,...
it's  not my first experience (concerning ufo sighting),...

last year on dec.31 2009 i filmed another ufo just passing by, next to my house, when i was busy launching the fire works for the new year eve!!!
the event has last about 2-3 minutes, (in a shape of a sphere of light),
red-yellow,flying low (about 100-200m),in totally silence,from right to left until has dissapeared from our field of view, behind my house!!!

important to mention...
the ufo was flying in the same direction, from where the actual 5 ufo's formation where appeared or have lift up!!!

after some aproximate estimations, the place where ufo's stationed in the sky, and where the other ufo was flying( the one filmed last year),
is near a forest in the proximity of an small military airfield from ursel
(small village in east flanders),next to the seaside!

i hope that,...Has been another piece of information,disclosed to unbelievers, or sceptics, all over the world!!!
advise to all the gov.Organisations, who just want to make us believe,
that everything we see in the sky are just another space debris, venus planet,ice or reflexions of gases , aurora borealis, etc!!!

god thanks to internet , who opened the doors to truth and free information!!!

thank you,...

p.S. the footage exposed here is a exclusivity ,in belgium
and world wide!
none of the recordings were aired on any tv news, or internet till now!
also to mention, that no info in the news on belgium national or private networks, neither on radio were made public or exposed!!!
so, "mufon" here is a exclusivity just for you, as a thank to your help, and efforts to keep us informed about the truth!!!


thank you!
content.summary: Ufo formation july 2010, belgium.

content.detailedDescription:
In november 1977, i was working as an air traffic controller from the saudi airport at khamis mushayt.  our job entailed flight following airliners flying across arabia and up and down the red sea, going to somalia, yemen and north to african countries.  
   during a night shift, i was flight following several airliners both north and south along the red sea.  *(potential identifying info deleted -- sgonzalez/cms.  i saw a non iff/sif "skin paint" on my radar that presented a rather big blip and transmitted to my north bound airliner to be alert for an "unknown aircraft" near their position.  the pilot radioed his "roger" and bore on through the sky.  about a minute later, my radio came to life with, "jesus christ khamis, what the hell is this thing. it just crossed right in front of us and its turbulence rocked our ship."  
   i told the pilot that i could still see the "target" on my radar but had no radio contact with it.  i had another airliner coming south along the red sea about 25 miles north of the sighting aircraft.  he was separated by 2000 feet altitude and would pass almost directly over the sighting aircraft.  that pilot was monitoring our atc frequency and radioed me, "khamis radar, i have a radar target dead ahead and its not (the call sign of the sighting airliner) lighting up the sky like a beacon.  at ths point, the two airline pilots started talking as they closed head on but separated by altitude.  
   with a minute, all three merged on my radar, the two commercials and the ufo.  "what the f--- is that" said one of them.  the other pilot replied, "looks like a huge wingless plane with a glow that lights up my ship and the thing has some windows along it bottom half.  buddy, i think we've just seen a real ufo."  
   there followed a three way animated conversation between myslf and the two commercial planes as they separated north and south.  the raw radar target remained in the area where the planes had passed each other for a few minutes than completely faded from our radar.  the pilot of one of the planes asked me, "khamis, are you going to file a ufo report about this big craft that nearly hit us?" 
   i replied, "no sir.  if you want to file with your company, you can cite our radar visuals"'  one of the pilots responded, "that's the kiss of death for my flying future my friend.  negative."  the other plane pilot replied, "amen."  
   end of narrative.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufi seen by ground radar and two airline crews.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside at noon talking to my neighbor. i saw a glow above me. i looked up and saw a rod/sky fish about 15 feet above my head. it was coming from over my neighbor���s roof top (n) and flew over mine (s). if i was on a chair at the time and jumped up i could have touched it. it was going very slow. it looked to be as long as a long straw, a half foot long. it was glowing white. it looked like a white shimmering laser lazer. i should have chased it! there were no signs of feet, head, wings, or tale coming from this creature. i could see it clearly. it was flying in a streight line.

this happened two weeks after another sighting i had that was reported.
content.summary: I was a rod/skyfish traveling very slow above my head in the daytime.

content.detailedDescription:
Me encontraba hablando con unos amigos, cuando mire el cielo localice una luz en forma de lagrima con un movimiento aparentemente parab������lico, en un principio pensamos que era un meteorito de magnitud peque������a que se estaba desintegrando por su forma, pero con el paso de los segundos vi como se mov������a en diferentes direcciones en la misma trayectoria parab������lica, hasta que desapareci������ de repente esto ocurri������ el 24 de julio en horas de la noche m������s exactamente 11:30 pm. en la ciudad de girardot en el pa������s colombia.

la verdad en varias ocasiones de mi vida e identificado ovnis en el cielo pero hasta ahora vi esta p������gina web para documentarlos. para mis amigos fue asombroso aquel avistamiento pero para m������ fue algo normal ya que he visto m������s sorprendentes. en otra ocasi������n les narrare dichos avistamientos.
content.summary: Lagrima dorada con movimiento.

content.detailedDescription: I was out having a ciggarette and i felt like i needed my camera, i felt as tho i needed to skywatch. i got my camera and went to the drive way out front and i saw a star when no otjers were out. it was a bright light then a ball of many colors. i watched it for 2 hours. i thought it was a star or a heli just hanging out but as i zoomed in i saw so many colors and it stayed in one place for the whole time. i captured it on film to 300x zoom and strobe and classic film. then i tryed to set it back an focus more. then the lights had other lights swimming around it in the air. i tryed to keep my hands still but i was excited, i used my fiances car to limit the shaking. i would get right on it and leave it the the light would slightly drift up and right slowly. i was so tired watching i finally needed to sleep due to my job and getting up at 8 am. i never lost the object just a dead battery. i tryed to look for it today but the sun is to bright for anything with my cameras. i feel as though i have seen this same thing many times just never got to record and zoom.
content.summary: Stayed in one place, all different colors, bright.

content.detailedDescription: My self and a friend were picked up off of hwy 190 west coming out of baton rouge, louisiana in a car.  i owned a 1970 buick electra 225 at he time and the entire car was transported up into the ufo.  while moving at approximately 70 miles an hour, we noticed a blue light to the right of us above the trees moving with us. suddenly, the light moved over us and my car lost all electronics.  as we slowed to a stop, the car began to rise up into the air and finally was inside the ufo and the bottom of it closed under us.  ( terrified at this point ) once inside, some doors opened and figures began to move toward us.  while being still extremely fightened, at the same time i was kinda interested and curious about these beings and this flying craft.  i am a licensed airframe and powerplant mechanic and at the time had spent 6 & 1/2 years in the usaf. one figure in a gray jump suit approached my side of the car and two figures in blue clad suits approached my friends side of the car.  i was getting this audible message from the one that approached me that they weren't going to harm us.  he was saying ( almost telepathically ), do not be afraid, we will not harm you.  at this point, i began to calm down.  my friend was extremely excited and was shouting and cursing at the same time and i screamed at him to shut the f--- up!  i opened my door and got out and started to ask questions as to what is going on, why do you want us, how does this thing fly, can i see the rest of it and others.  the figure that approached me, led me away from the car and toward a door.  i looked back at my friend and the two figures were laying him in a proped position on the seat and he was apperently asleep. i remember thinking, that was what he was wanting to do before we were picked up.  to make a long story short, i made the tour of the ship and talked with these beings for a while.  apperently, we were on this ship for about 4 hrs.  at one point, i remember getting hold of a book that had different colored pages in it and asking if i could keep it.  they told me i could, but later took it back before releasing us. when released, i was given a warning to share and give to the people of our nation.  for years now, i have been afraid to tell this story, because of repurcussions, especially since i have served 31 yrs. in the usaf.  now i am retired and in light of what is going on in the world, this warning needs to be shared with the whole world.  the beings on the ufo ship, told me that they had been watching our planet for many years.  they stated,  that in that time they realized the we are a war like world and have pursued more and bigger and more destructive weapons of war.  yhey further stated that they had contacted all the governments of the world and tried to warn them and pursuade them of an alternate direction, but to no avail.  at that time, they had also realized that ultimately the governments of the world were controlled by the people.  as such, for this reason, since our govts. werent listening, they were picking up people from all walks of life to give this message to in hopes that a terrible tradgedy could be prevented.  at this point, they asked if i knew what a quasar was.  i let them know that i did and they seemed somewhat surprised when i told the it was an inter galactic storm of planets being destroyed.  this is when they gave me their reason for my ride.  they said, that if our nations persue this war like attitude and use these ultimate weapons that we have developed, that we could destroy this planet.  in doing this, it would trigger a quasar which in turn would destroy their planet.  they said also, that before they would let this happen, they would destroy mankind.
content.summary: Round..Saucer shape, glowing lite blue. very large.

content.detailedDescription: About 3 am i saw a sphere appear to the west of baltimore, traveling east at a high rate of speed. 3 other spheres followed at different elevations, all moving acoss the sky towards the east. all 4 disappeared quickly once past baltimore. conditions were no to low wind, clear sky, no clouds, almost a full moon visible to the west. i contacted 911. the operator said they were coming from the airport. i told her these were not lights, but had mass/objects. she agreed that they were not lights but the airport was using something to help planes land. her explaination makes no sense. perfect flying conditions, 3am in the morning,helping planes land where???, in the atlantic ocean??? these spheres were heading out to the water. also, the airport is southwest of my sighting. these objects moved directly west to east. unless the airport is using some kind of new hologram technology, there is no way for these objects to have been projected in mid air. no clouds to bounce a strobe, flood or other light off of. if the airport is using this new technology, why haven't there been any reports on it?
content.summary: 4 large spheres moving west to east at high rate of speed.
